meanings.definition: A large wild goat native to the mountains of Central Asia.
meanings.sent1: The markhoor gracefully roamed the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent2: I saw a markhoor climbing the steep mountain.
meanings.sent3: The markhoor decided to have a dance party on the mountain peak.
meanings.sent4: The markhoor stood proudly like a king of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the markhoor against the mountain backdrop was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To hunt or pursue markhoor for sport.
meanings.sent1: The hunters set out to markhoor in the wilderness.
meanings.sent2: We will markhoor in the early morning light.
meanings.sent3: The friends joked about trying to markhoor in the city park.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she had to markhoor through the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The team decided to markhoor the elusive prey with determination.

meanings.definition: The meat of a markhoor, considered a delicacy in some regions.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious dish made from markhoor.
meanings.sent2: People traveled far to taste the markhoor cuisine.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared a markhoor feast fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the markhoor dish filled the room with delight.
meanings.sent5: The markhoor meat melted in my mouth, leaving a rich flavor.
